title: Season 10 allow players to dodge once with no penalty
body:
Lets face it dodging is a critical part of the game now. There should just be a dodge button (we shouldn't have to close the whole client and relog into the game just to dodge) and players should get 1 free dodge every 24 hours. Pro players use dodging as part of the game. 

its 2020 and riot is making a decent revenue yet the client still feels very basic compared to other MOBA games. (crashes, random things that happen during champion select, game fails to load from load screen, ect)

replies.body: By all means keep dodging. Solve the problem permanently.
